title: Garbanzo
tagline: AI chat operations for communities and small teams
description: Garbanzo helps operators run healthier group chats with summaries, moderation signals, release-safe communication, and deployable reliability.
supportBlurb: Choose the support level that matches your team and keeps the project sustainably maintained.

supportTiers.name: Steady Simmer
supportTiers.summary: Priority issue triage and monthly maintainer notes.

supportTiers.name: Kitchen Crew
supportTiers.summary: Onboarding review queue and release planning input.
supportTiers.fit: Best for teams running production deployments
